channel.title: üè¢ School of Computer Science and Engineering, Southeast University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ School of Computer Science and Engineering, Southeast University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Motion-aware Spatio-temporal Graph for Video Salient Object Ranking
item.description: A novel motion-aware spatio-temporal graph model surpasses existing methods in video salient object ranking by jointly optimizing multi-scale spatial and temporal features, thus accurately prioritizin…

item.title: Continuous Contrastive Learning for Long-Tailed Semi-Supervised Recognition
item.description: CCL, a novel probabilistic framework, uses continuous contrastive learning to excel in long-tailed semi-supervised recognition, surpassing prior state-of-the-art methods by over 4%.

item.title: Linearly Decomposing and Recomposing Vision Transformers for Diverse-Scale Models
item.description: Linearly decompose & recompose Vision Transformers to create diverse-scale models efficiently, reducing computational costs & improving flexibility for various applications.

item.title: Multi-Label Open Set Recognition
item.description: SLAN: A novel approach for multi-label open-set recognition, enriching sub-labeling info using structural data to identify unknown labels.

item.title: Vision-Language Models are Strong Noisy Label Detectors
item.description: Vision-language models effectively detect noisy labels, improving image classification accuracy with DEFT.
